title: Kingsted T-Shirts for Men Pack - Royally Comfortable - Super Soft Premium Fabric - Well-Crafted Classic Tee
description: ROYALLY COMFORTABLE - Kingsted men's t-shirts are designed to look and feel like an old favorite. These super soft classic tees for men will quickly become your favorite comfy t-shirts you wear first

PREMIUM FABRIC - Our basic shirts for men are made with premium blend of polyester & cotton t-shirt fabric. The finish is a Wrinkle Resistant, Fast-Drying and Ultra-Durable high quality t-shirt for men
CLASSIC TEES FOR MEN - Kingsted mens t-shirts are well-crafted true classic tees for men. These casual shirts for men have fitted side seams that help maintain shape better than tubular mens tees

LONG LASTING - Kingsted colored t-shirts for men are heather dyed and maintain color much longer than other cheap cotton shirts for men. These lightweight polycotton t-shirts are exceptionally durable
VALUE PACK - Bundle & Save on our short sleeve t-shirts for men packs. Kingsted's premium t shirts for men offer the same or more value as other designer t-shirts for men for a better price.
